duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and drive regional major account sales teams to exceed company objectives.
Responsible for building a high-performance sales culture that delivers results in bookings, sales development, and forecast accuracy.
Mentor and develop team members to accomplish individual and organizational goals.
Track sales activity, provide sales projects, and create and analyze metrics.
Review weekly forecast and business outcomes with representatives and sales leaders.
Coach, develop, and mentor representatives to success in all aspects of the sales cycle.
Build sales analysis for insight into weekly, monthly and quarterly execution and strategies.
Stay knowledgeable and up-to-date on product roadmap, industry changes, and competitive landscapes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
